mapper.select: SELECT MYNO, MYNAME, MYTITLE, MYCONTENT, MYDATE FROM MYBOARD ORDER BY MYNO DESC

SELECT SUB FROM( SELECT DAY, SUBSTR (str, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) + 1, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL + 1) - INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) - 1 ) sub FROM (SELECT DAY, ',' || RESER || ',' str, ',' dlm FROM RESERVATION )
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (str) - LENGTH (REPLACE (str, ',')) - 1 ) WHERE DAY = #{day} and SUB is not null GROUP BY SUB

SELECT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, SUB, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUB, '[^-]+',1,1)AS ROOM ,REGEXP_SUBSTR(SUB, '[^-]+',1,2)AS R_TIME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, SUB FROM( SELECT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, SUBSTR (str, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) + 1, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL + 1) - INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) - 1 ) sub FROM (SELECT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, ',' || RESER || ',' str, ',' dlm FROM RESERVATION ) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (str) - LENGTH (REPLACE (str, ',')) - 1 ) WHERE SUB is not null ) WHERE U_NO = #{u_no} ORDER BY RESER_NO

SELECT SUB FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, SUB FROM( SELECT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, SUBSTR (str, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) + 1, INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL + 1) - INSTR (str, dlm, 1, LEVEL) - 1 ) sub FROM (SELECT U_NO, RESER_NO, DAY, ',' || RESER || ',' str, ',' dlm FROM RESERVATION ) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH (str) - LENGTH (REPLACE (str, ',')) - 1 ) WHERE SUB is not null ) WHERE U_NO= #{u_no} AND RESER_NO= #{reser_no} AND SUB != #{sub} ORDER BY RESER_NO
